docs.title: Conclusion
docs.text: For any assistance or inquiries: Phone Support: Call +8379281.（available on weekdays）

docs.title: Step 1: Start the Copying Process
docs.text: • Click the "Self-Service Copy" option on the Touch Screen to begin.

docs.title: Step 2: Authenticate with Your Campus Card
docs.text:
• Swipe your campus card over the sensor area below the screen for authentication.

Note

Please complete this action within 30-second countdown. After swiping your card, remove it from the sensor to proceed.

docs.title: Step 3: Prepare Your Document for Scanning
docs.text: • Open the printer lid and place the original document face down on the glass plate, and ensure that the document aligns with the scale indicators.

docs.title: Step 4: Set Copying Parameters
docs.text:
• Tap the "Copy" icon on the copier screen to begin, and configure the copying settings
  • On the screen in front of the copier, configure the copying settings: Density: Adjust the darkness or lightness of the copies. Size: Choose the paper size for the copies. Quantity: Select the number of copies you wish to print. Single/Duplex: Decide if you want single-sided or double-sided copies. Paper Tray: Select the appropriate paper tray. Original Size: Specify the size of the original document. Original Type: Choose the type of original (text, photo, etc.).

docs.title: Step 5: Start the Copying Process
docs.text:
• Press the "Start" button on the screen to begin copying.

Note

Ensure that the copier lid is closed; otherwise, the copying process will not initiate.

docs.title: Step 6: Collect Your Documents
docs.text:
• After copying, remember to take your original documents and copies.
  • If you forget to take the original, a pop-up alert will appear on the copier's screen, and an audible “beep” sound will notify you.

docs.title: Step 7: End copying process
docs.text:
• Swipe card and pay fees.
  • After copying is complete, either swipe your card at the sensor or wait 90 seconds without any operation for the copier to exit the copying mode automatically.
  • Any applicable charges will be deducted at this time. If there was no charge this time, the system will deduct the amount during your next usage.

Note

Ensure that all your documents are collected and that you have completed your session.

docs.title: Equipment Overview
docs.text:
• Computer: mainly used to upload files
  • Touch Screen: mainly used to select service type and swipe card payment
  • Printer: mainly used for printing and copying

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: In order to provide a more simple and convenient series of services such as self-service printing and copying, the Southeast University Library and Hangzhou Unifound Information Technology Company have founded a library self-service system. Now officially launched, welcome to use!

docs.title: Location
docs.text: On the Jiulonghu campus, self-service printing services are located in the center on the second floor of the library. On the Sipailou campus, the print center is located in Room 100 on the first floor of the library. On the Dingjiaqiao campus, the Print Center is located in Room 303 on the third floor of the library.

docs.title: Step 1: Transfer Files
docs.text:
• Log in to WeChat and upload the files to be printed through WeChat.

Note

Remember to exit wechat account after printing.

docs.title: Step 2:Save and Open the File
docs.text: • Log in to WeChat and upload the files to be printed through WeChat.

docs.title: Step 3: Click print options in Word
docs.text: • Open the file menu bar and click print options.

docs.title: Step 4: Set printer parameters
docs.text: • In this step, select the number of pages to print and whether to print on both sides

docs.title: Step 5: Set page parameters
docs.text: • In this step, select the margins and paper orientation.

docs.title: Step 6: Click print options
docs.text: • Click print options, then enter the Lianchuang printing management system.

docs.title: Step 7: Log in to "Lianchuang Printing Management System"
docs.text: • Enter the account and password in the login interface.

docs.title: Step 8: Click ‘Self-Service Printing’ option on the Screen
Step 9: Swipe the card over the sensor area
docs.text:
• Swipe campus card over the sensor area to download the documents to the printer, then documents will be displayed on the screen.
  • The self-service printing system automatically deduct fees from the campus card.

docs.title: Step 10: Swipe the card again
docs.text: • Swipe the card again to confirm print operation; If do not print, click skip option

docs.title: Step 11: Take away the File and Finish Printing
docs.text:
Tip

  • The download time will be longer when printing PDF files or other large files. Please be patient!
  • Upload and print PDF files in sections, please no more than 100 pages!

docs.title: Common Problems and Solutions
docs.text:
7.1. Deducting fees without producing paper
  • Check whether the printer is short of paper. If there is no paper, please contact the staff to add paper
  • Confirm that the correct paper size has been selected, if the wrong paper type (not A3 / A4), may cause the content to not be printed. At this point, you can click the "Menu" button on the screen to enter the "print error" list, delete the wrong printing task and reprint.
  • If the submitted file is too large, try to submit the printing in batches.
7.2. Print interrupt
  • Check whether the network connection is stable. If it is unstable, please wait for the network to recover before continuing printing.
  • If you print too much content, you can click the "Menu" button on the screen to enter the "Job List" and wait for the task to continue to upload and continue to print.
7.3. File upload failed
  • Check whether the file format is supported, if not, please convert to a supported format.
  • Check if the file size exceeds the printer limit, if more than, please try to upload or compress.
  • Make sure the device is connected to a stable network for file transfer.
7.4. Lack of ink
  • When the printer prompts the lack of ink, you need to replace a new ink cartridge or toner cartridge in time.
  • When replacing the cartridge, make sure the cartridge model is correct and follow the steps in the printer instructions.
7.5. Paper jam
  • Paper jam is one of the common faults of printers, usually caused by poor paper quality, incorrect paper size, or impurities inside the printer.
  • When solving the paper jam problem, please follow the prompts on the printer screen to avoid forcefully pulling the paper and causing damage to the printer.

docs.title: 8.1. Protect personal privacy
docs.text:
• When printing sensitive documents or personal information, please ensure that the printed documents are taken away in time after the printing is completed to avoid being obtained by others.
  • Before printing, confirm that the printer has cleared the previous print task to prevent others from obtaining your print file.
  • Remember to exit WeChat after printing.

docs.title: 8.2. Compliance with the regulations of use
docs.text:
• Please follow the library's self-service printer use rules and do not abuse printer resources or print irrelevant documents.
  • Abide by copyright laws and do not print infringing documents or pirated materials.

docs.title: 8.3. Pay attention to equipment maintenance
docs.text:
• A self-service printer is a high-frequency equipment that requires regular maintenance and maintenance.
  • Before use, please check whether the printer is working normally. If there is any abnormal situation, please report to repair in time.
  • Keep the surroundings of the printer clean and avoid dust and debris entering the printer and affecting the printing quality and equipment life.

docs.title: System Overview
docs.text:
• This system provides self-service printing and copying services.

  • The whole process of the system is unmanned management, and readers can easily use the campus card to operate on any machine equipped with the card end of the system on the campus.

  • To use the self-service, you must have a campus card to pay for it.

  • Please download Print Driver “Unifound Self-Service Print Driver" when printing on a PC for the first time.

  • Please visit the following website: 10.9.4.214:9130, if you use the Cloud Print service.

More details follow the Self-service Copy and Print Usage Manual.

docs.title: 总结
docs.text: 如需任何帮助和咨询: 电话号码: Call +8379281.（工作日提供服务）

docs.title: 步骤 1: 开始复印过程
docs.text: • 点击触摸屏上的 "自助复印" 选项以开始。

docs.title: 步骤 2: 使用校园卡认证
docs.text:
• 将**校园卡**在屏幕下方的感应区域轻轻滑过进行认证。

Note

请在 30 秒 倒计时内完成此操作。刷卡后，从感应区移开校园卡以继续操作。

docs.title: 步骤 3: 准备扫描文件
docs.text: • 打开复印机盖板，将原始文件**正面朝下**放置在玻璃板上，并确保文件与刻度线对齐。

docs.title: 步骤 4: 设置复印参数
docs.text:
• 点击复印机屏幕上的 "复印" 图标开始，并配置复印设置。
  • 在复印机屏幕上，设置复印参数： 密度: 调整复印的深浅度。 尺寸: 选择复印纸张的大小。 数量: 选择所需的复印数量。 单面/双面: 选择单面或双面复印。 纸张来源: 选择合适的纸张来源。 原始文件大小: 指定原始文件的大小。 原件类型: 选择原件类型（文本、照片等）。

docs.title: 步骤 5: 开始复印
docs.text:
• 按屏幕上的 "开始" 按钮开始复印。

Note

请确保复印机盖已关闭，否则复印过程将不会启动。

docs.title: 步骤 6: 收取文件
docs.text:
• 复印完成后，**请记得**带走您的原始文件和复印件。
  • 若您**忘记**取走原件，复印机屏幕会弹出提醒，并发出“哔”声提醒您。

docs.title: 步骤 7: 结束复印过程
docs.text:
• 刷卡并支付费用。
  • 复印完成后，可在感应区刷卡退出，或等待 90 秒未操作，系统将自动退出复印模式。
  • 此时将扣除相关费用。若本次未扣款，系统将在您下次使用时扣除相应费用。

Note

请确保所有文件已取走，并确认已完成会话。

docs.title: 设备简介
docs.text:
• 电脑: 主要用于上传文件
  • 触摸屏:主要用于选择服务类型和刷卡扣费
  • 打印机: 主要用于打印和复印

docs.title: 引言
docs.text: 为了提供更加简单便捷的自助打印、复印等服务，东南大学图书馆与杭州优凡信息技术有限公司共同建立了图书馆自助服务系统。该系统现已正式上线，欢迎使用！

docs.title: 位置
docs.text: 在 九龙湖 校区，自助打印服务位于图书馆二楼的中心位置。 在 四牌楼 校区，打印中心位于图书馆一楼的100室。 在 丁家桥 校区，打印中心位于图书馆三楼的303室。

docs.title: 步骤 1: 传输文件
docs.text:
• 登录微信并通过微信上传要打印的文件。

Note

**请记得**在打印完成后退出微信账号。

docs.title: 步骤 2: 保存并打开文件
docs.text: • 登录微信并上传要打印的文件。

docs.title: 步骤 3: 在 Word 中点击打印选项
docs.text: • 打开**文件**菜单栏并点击**打印**选项。

docs.title: 步骤 4: 设置打印机参数
docs.text: • 在此步骤中，选择要打印的**页数**以及是否双面打印。

docs.title: 步骤 5: 设置页面参数
docs.text: • 在此步骤中，选择**页边距**和**纸张方向**。

docs.title: 步骤 6: 点击打印选项
docs.text: • 点击打印选项，进入联创打印管理系统。

docs.title: 步骤 7: 登录“联创打印管理系统”
docs.text: • 在登录界面输入账号和密码。

docs.title: 步骤 8: 点击屏幕上的“自助打印”选项
步骤 9: 将校园卡滑过感应区域
docs.text:
• 将**校园卡**滑过感应区域，下载文件到打印机，文件将显示在屏幕上。
  • 自助打印系统会自动从校园卡中扣除费用。

docs.title: 步骤 10: 再次刷卡
docs.text: • **再次刷卡**以确认打印操作；如不打印，请点击跳过选项。

docs.title: 步骤 11: 拿走文件并完成打印
docs.text:
Tip

  • 打印 PDF 文件或其他大文件时下载时间较长，请耐心等待！
  • PDF 文件请分段上传并打印，单次不超过100页！

docs.title: 常见问题及解决方案
docs.text:
7.1. 扣费但未出纸
  • 检查打印机是否缺纸。如果没有纸，请联系工作人员添加纸张。
  • 确认选择了正确的纸张尺寸。如果选择了错误的纸张类型（非 A3 / A4），可能会导致内容无法打印。此时，可以点击屏幕上的“菜单”按钮，进入“打印错误”列表，删除错误的打印任务并重新打印。
  • 如果提交的文件过大，尝试分批提交打印。
7.2. 打印中断
  • 检查网络连接是否稳定。如不稳定，请等待网络恢复后继续打印。
  • 如果打印内容过多，可点击屏幕上的“菜单”按钮，进入“任务列表”，等待任务继续上传并继续打印。
7.3. 文件上传失败
  • 检查文件格式是否支持，如不支持，请转换为支持的格式。
  • 检查文件大小是否超过打印机限制，如超出，请尝试分批上传或压缩文件。
  • 确保设备连接到稳定的网络，以便文件传输。
7.4. 缺墨
  • 当打印机提示缺墨时，需要及时更换新的墨盒或碳粉盒。
  • 更换墨盒时，请确保墨盒型号正确，并按照打印机说明中的步骤进行更换。
7.5. 卡纸
  • 卡纸是打印机常见故障之一，通常是由于纸张质量差、纸张尺寸不正确或打印机内部有杂物导致的。
  • 解决卡纸问题时，请按照打印机屏幕上的提示操作，避免强行拉扯纸张造成打印机损坏。

docs.title: 8.1. 保护个人隐私
docs.text:
• 在打印敏感文件或个人信息时，请确保打印完成后及时取走文件，以免被他人获取。
  • 打印前，确认打印机已清除上一个打印任务，防止他人获取您的打印文件。
  • 打印完成后记得退出微信。

docs.title: 8.2. 遵守使用规定
docs.text:
• 请遵守图书馆的自助打印机使用规定，不滥用打印资源或打印无关文件。
  • 遵守版权法，禁止打印侵权文件或盗版材料。

docs.title: 8.3. 注意设备维护
docs.text:
• 自助打印机属于高频设备，需定期维护和保养。
  • 使用前请检查打印机是否正常工作，若有异常情况请及时报修。
  • 保持打印机周围环境清洁，避免灰尘和杂物进入打印机，影响打印质量和设备寿命。

docs.title: 系统概述
docs.text:
• 该系统提供**自助打印**和**复印**服务。

  • 整个系统过程为无人管理，读者可以轻松使用校园卡在校园内任何配备系统卡端的机器上进行操作。

  • 使用自助服务时，必须使用**校园卡**进行支付。

  • 首次在电脑上打印时，请下载打印驱动程序“Unifound自助打印驱动程序”。

  • 如使用云打印服务，请访问以下网址：10.9.4.214:9130。

更多详情请参考《自助复印和打印使用手册》。
